de.engehausen.treemap
Interface ISelectionChangeListener<N>

Type Parameters:
N - the type of node the listener acts for
All Known Implementing Classes:
FileViewer, FileViewer
public interface ISelectionChangeListener<N>

Listener that is to be notified when the selection changes in the tree map.

Method Summary
 void selectionChanged(ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> model, IRectangle<N> rectangle, java.lang.String label)
          Indicates a selection change in the tree map.
 

Method Detail

selectionChanged

void selectionChanged(ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> model,
                      IRectangle<N> rectangle,
                      java.lang.String label)
Indicates a selection change in the tree map.

Parameters:
model - the model the rectangle comes from; never null.
rectangle - the rectangle the tree map now shows as selected.
label - the label of the rectangle; may be null.
